casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2013-1344. State v. Montoya.

Clermont App. No. CA2012-02-015, 2013-Ohio-3312. Discretionary appeal accepted; cause held for the decision in case No. 2012-1741, State v. Miranda, 10th Dist. Franklin No. 11AP-788, 2012-Ohio-3971; and briefing stayed.

Pfeifer, J., dissents.
